page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On Sept 20th. I went to Butlins at Minehead. We had a go on a ghost train. It had a blue FLUORESCENT light shining on a ghost through a door which goes down a hill . Then I went on the Big Dipper and went up until I was in the air .We went on the space invader. It was dark .It went up then down very fast.I went back to our caravanette for a meal. We went back to the fair and went on the rockets which went round and round .We got on the cable cars that took me to the other side of Butlins and went on the small motor bikes. I ran into the straw bales.I enjoyed the big wheel and finally the water boats.
